overview: “Tom is responsible for the overall management of the company and investment capital. Prior to Tyfone, Tom was the Managing Principal of Summerville Advisors, a strategy consulting firm. He has extensive experience in working with senior management of financial institutions to provide alternative distribution and management strategies, strategic marketing initiatives, and M&A counsel. Prior to that Tom was a Managing Partner, Board Member, and co-developer of M Financial Group, a company with a distribution force made up of one hundred twenty firms and over $700 million in revenue. Tom served as a board member during the reorganization of SAIF, Oregon’s state accident insurance fund, and he currently serves on several other corporate boards, including National Worksite Partners, Insurance Advisors, and Coyote Ventures. He has advised venture capital firms on both new ventures and portfolio companies and served as a Senior Advisor to National Financial Partners (NFP/NYSE).Tom is also a member of both the American and California Bar Associations.” (Source: Tyfone)
